name: CactusSoft
tagline: Software Solutions & Services for your Business
description:
CactusSoft is an International Organization headquartered in Belgium that provides end to end services in software development, integration and technology consulting that enable its clients to improve their workforce, operations, and business performance. We specialize in projects for Fintech & banking sector, IoT (Internet of Things), Digital Workplace and Healthcare.
Since 2007, CactusSoft has been delivering its services to customers across Europe and the USA and has successfully completed 300+ projects. 
The company's services include:
- business analysis and prototyping
- design
- software development
- testing
- integration
- quality assurance
- post-project maintenance and support
